channel.title: Am i in the wrong here?
channel.description:
I come from epic mafia and i was a pretty good mafia player. But last ToL game i played, every single player in the game disagreed with me, i guess its ok to question yourself. Everyone said i misplayed.
Here is what happened.
I was princess and got the report "10 is killer or offensive" night 1.
I wispered this to king day 2.
King decided to check 10. He wrote in his will "N2, checking 10 to confirm if bad"
King was visibly new and thought i said 10 is bad, but thats obviously not what i said.
But then, King died during n2. When people saw that will, everyone instantly voted 10, because obviously that did seem sus from their point of view.
But during the trial, the guy claimed drunk. So i insisted really hard to pardon him, because quite obviously, there is literally 0 reasons to think hes lying so far (Drunk is offensive).
He actually turned up being the assassin. Everyone said i was insanely suspicious because i defended the assassin.
I decided to Wisp during the night to prove my innocence, but i was role blocked.
Next day, i tried to explain the story, but 14/16 lynched me.
After the game, i tryed to explain to them why lynching someone that claims drunk ONLY based on a killer or offensive report was dumb, and nobody agreed with me (except the king).

item.title: Am i in the wrong here?
item.dc:creator: Floofyboy
item.description:
same here. I actually think its generally a bad idea to go against the flow in this game.

Read full topic
item.source: Am i in the wrong here?

item.title: Am i in the wrong here?
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
I have got myself hung before because I defended someone because the evidence against them was minimal and it turns out I was wrong .
Iv also been the only pardon for a bd exe a few times
And once hilariously I was the only pardon for a fool , then got exed a few days later for being the only one to pardon the fool

Read full topic
item.source: Am i in the wrong here?

item.title: Am i in the wrong here?
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
He should have at least two debauchs, so that’s something

item.description:
Drunk is incredibly bad fake claim, as drunk is easily provable. Did assassin have a good will?

item.title: Am i in the wrong here?
item.dc:creator: Floofyboy
item.description:
haha yea its a bit what happened. In a way, it was maybe bad luck he actually WAS a bad guy. If he turned good then people woulda apologized

Read full topic
item.source: Am i in the wrong here?

item.title: Am i in the wrong here?
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Alexandre_Campeau:

King was visibly new and thought i said 10 is bad, but thats obviously not what i said.

Oh, in his logs – gotcha. EIther way. Ever play that whisper game in elementary school? Where you whisper through about 10 people then say at the end what was said? I think it’s called waterfall. One bit of misinformation can lead to catastrophically changing events.

Read full topic
item.source: Am i in the wrong here?

item.title: Am i in the wrong here?
item.dc:creator: Floofyboy
item.description:
King never revealed me? I revealed myself to “save” that drunk, because the way the king wrote his will, he did seem sus.

Read full topic
item.source: Am i in the wrong here?

item.title: Am i in the wrong here?
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Looks like stacks of miscommunication. You did fine lol, just bad luck. It happens.

EDIT: The King started the domino effect. The King shouldn’t have even revealed you, just shared the info (even though he shared the 1/2 wrong info)

Read full topic
item.source: Am i in the wrong here?
